tasks.task_description: Create database schema with tables for films, characters, planets, starships, battles, species, and factions
Create views for complex queries and reporting
Generate test data with thousands of entries across all tables
Create indexes and relationships between tables

description: Create Star Wars test database with tables, views, and thousands of test entries
context: Created comprehensive database schema with 7 main tables (films, species, planets, factions, characters, starships, battles) and 3 junction tables for many-to-many relationships. Added indexes for performance.
Created 6 useful database views: character_details, battle_summary, faction_fleets, character_filmography, planet_stats, and force_users for complex queries and reporting.

Successfully generated comprehensive Star Wars test database with thousands of entries: 6 films, 10 species, 100 planets, 10 factions, 2000 characters, 500 starships, 200 battles, plus thousands of relationship records in junction tables.
